Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to be followed by SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all variants ending in an EIC decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision, SW-EIC Minor Revision, SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Time from the last occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases with multiple reviewer agreements
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time until SW-Awaiting EIC Decision is performed after the completion of all required reviewer agreements (i.e., after the final SW-Reviewer Agreed event per case)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision compared to the total resolution time of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and the subsequent EIC decision activity (e.g., SW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Reject)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where at least one reviewer declined versus cases where all invited reviewers agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between Manuscript Export Succeeded and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that proceed without checklist delays versus those with SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between Plagiarism Originality Report Completed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases that reach SW-Awaiting EIC Decision without intermediate revision requests
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Cycle Time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision measured from the moment all reviewers have responded (last SW-Reviewer Agreed or SW-Reviewer No Response) until the EIC initiates a decision activity
Metric: the average of the duration between the first time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' or `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer No Response' and the last time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include major or minor revision cycles versus those that lead directly to acceptance or rejection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and the end of the case

Name: Time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in streamlined review paths versus paths involving Assign a Different Editor or Unassign Editor
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
